name: ImplERC721TokenReceiver
description: ImplERC721TokenReceiver. Handle the safeTransfers of NFT to the bridge.

functionDecorators.name: onERC721Received
functionDecorators.description: Handle the receipt of an NFTThe contract address is always the message sender. The ERC721 smart contract calls this function on the recipient after a `transfer`. This function MAY throw to revert and reject the transfer. Return of other than the magic value MUST result in the transaction being reverted.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: The address which previously owned the token.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: The NFT identifier which is being transferred _param _data Additional data with no specified format.
